attributes.action: Give the UK people more say in govenrment decisions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Come on Tony, put your faith in the Bristish people lets have more open debate on the dicisions in government.
Let us vote on the next 10 big votes in the house. See if the results match the government views. This will test if the government has got it right on the peoples view.
